title: PM presented Muslims case against Islamophobia effectively: Farrukh
content:
ISLAMABAD, Dec 16 (APP):Minister of State for Information and Broadcasting Farrukh Habib on Thursday said Pakistanâ€™s valiant Prime Minister Imran Khan presented case of Muslims against Islamophobia at every international forum including the United Nations.
In a tweet, PM Imran Khan had presented case of Muslims effectively and now its positive effects were receiving.
The minister welcomed the passage of a bill against Islamophobia in the House of Representatives.
